content.goal: C(n,m) * C(m,r) = C(n,r) * C(n - r,m - r)
content.latex_goal: C(n,m) C(m,r) = C(n,r) C(n - r,m - r)

steps.res: factorial(n) / (factorial(r) * factorial(n - r)) * (factorial(n - r) / (factorial(m - r) * factorial(-m + n)))

proof.goal: C(n,m) * C(m,r) = C(n,r) * C(n - r,m - r)
proof.latex_goal: C(n,m) C(m,r) = C(n,r) C(n - r,m - r)

steps.res: factorial(n) / (factorial(m - 1) * factorial(-m + n + 1)) + factorial(n) / (factorial(m) * factorial(-m + n))
factorial(n) * m / ((m - 1 + 1) * factorial(m - 1) * factorial(-m + n + 1)) + factorial(n) / (factorial(m) * factorial(-m + n))

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting factorial(n) / (factorial(m - 1) * factorial(-m + n + 1)) to factorial(n) * m / ((m - 1 + 1) * factorial(m - 1) * factorial(-m + n + 1))

steps.res: factorial(n) * m / ((m - 1 + 1) * factorial(m - 1) * factorial(-m + n + 1)) + factorial(n) * (-m + n + 1) / (factorial(m) * ((-m + n + 1) * factorial(-m + n)))

rule.latex_str: rewriting \(\frac{n!}{m! (-m + n)!}\) to \(\frac{n! (-m + n + 1)}{m! ((-m + n + 1) (-m + n)!)}\)
rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting factorial(n) / (factorial(m) * factorial(-m + n)) to factorial(n) * (-m + n + 1) / (factorial(m) * ((-m + n + 1) * factorial(-m + n)))

steps.res: factorial(n) * m / ((m - 1 + 1) * factorial(m - 1) * factorial(-m + n + 1)) + factorial(n) * (-m + n + 1) / (factorial(m) * factorial(-m + n + 1))

rule.latex_str: rewrite \((-m + n + 1) (-m + n)!\) to \((-m + n + 1)!\) using identity at 1.1.1
rule.name: ApplyIdentity
rule.str: rewrite (-m + n + 1) * factorial(-m + n) to factorial(-m + n + 1) using identity at 1.1.1

steps.res: factorial(n) * m / (factorial(m - 1 + 1) * factorial(-m + n + 1)) + factorial(n) * (-m + n + 1) / (factorial(m) * factorial(-m + n + 1))

rule.name: ApplyIdentity
rule.str: rewrite (m - 1 + 1) * factorial(m - 1) to factorial(m - 1 + 1) using identity at 0.1.0

steps.res: factorial(n) * (-m + n + 1) / (factorial(m) * factorial(-m + n + 1)) + m * factorial(n) / (factorial(m) * factorial(-m + n + 1))

rule.name: Equation
rule.old_expr: factorial(n) * (-m + n + 1) / (factorial(m) * factorial(-m + n + 1)) + m * factorial(n) / (factorial(m) * factorial(-m + n + 1))
rule.str: rewriting factorial(n) * (-m + n + 1) / (factorial(m) * factorial(-m + n + 1)) + m * factorial(n) / (factorial(m) * factorial(-m + n + 1)) to (n + 1) * factorial(n) / (factorial(m) * factorial(-m + n + 1))

rule.latex_str: rewrite \((n + 1) n!\) to \((n + 1)!\) using identity at 0
rule.name: ApplyIdentity
rule.str: rewrite (n + 1) * factorial(n) to factorial(n + 1) using identity at 0

content.goal: C(m + n + 1,m) = SUM(i, 0, m, C(n + i,i))

proof.goal: C(m + n + 1,m) = SUM(i, 0, m, C(n + i,i))

steps.res: SUM(j, 0, m + 1 - 1, C(j + n,j)) + SUM(j, m + 1, m + 1, C(j + n,j))
C(m + n + 1,m + 1) + SUM(j, 0, m, C(j + n,j))
C(m + n + 1,m + 1) + SUM(j, 0, m, C(n + j,j))

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting j + n to n + j

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting C(m + n + 1,m + 1) + C(m + n + 1,m) to C(m + n + 1,m + 1 - 1) + C(m + n + 1,m + 1)

content.goal: (x + y) ^ n = SUM(k, 0, n, C(n,k) * x ^ k * y ^ (n - k))

proof.goal: (x + y) ^ n = SUM(k, 0, n, C(n,k) * x ^ k * y ^ (n - k))

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting (x + y) ^ (n + 1) to (x + y) * (x + y) ^ n

steps.res: (x + y) * SUM(k, 0, n, C(n,k) * x ^ k * y ^ (n - k))
x * SUM(k, 0, n, x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k)) + y * SUM(k, 0, n, x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k))
SUM(k, 0, n, x * (x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k))) + y * SUM(k, 0, n, x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k))

rule.latex_str: rewriting \(x \sum_{k=0}^{n}{x ^ {k} y ^ {-k + n} C(n,k)}\) to \(\sum_{k=0}^{n}{x (x ^ {k} y ^ {-k + n} C(n,k))}\)
rule.name: Equation
rule.new_expr: SUM(k, 0, n, x * (x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k)))
rule.old_expr: x * SUM(k, 0, n, x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k))
rule.str: rewriting x * SUM(k, 0, n, x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k)) to SUM(k, 0, n, x * (x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k)))

steps.res: SUM(k, 0, n, x * (x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k))) + SUM(k, 0, n, y * (x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k)))

rule.latex_str: rewriting \(y \sum_{k=0}^{n}{x ^ {k} y ^ {-k + n} C(n,k)}\) to \(\sum_{k=0}^{n}{y (x ^ {k} y ^ {-k + n} C(n,k))}\)
rule.name: Equation
rule.new_expr: SUM(k, 0, n, y * (x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k)))
rule.old_expr: y * SUM(k, 0, n, x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k))
rule.str: rewriting y * SUM(k, 0, n, x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k)) to SUM(k, 0, n, y * (x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k)))

rule.latex_str: rewriting \(x (x ^ {k} y ^ {-k + n} C(n,k))\) to \(C(n,k) x ^ {k + 1} y ^ {n - k}\)
rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting x * (x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k)) to C(n,k) * x ^ (k + 1) * y ^ (n - k)

steps.res: SUM(k, 0, n, C(n,k) * x ^ (k + 1) * y ^ (n - k)) + SUM(k, 0, n, C(n,k) * x ^ k * y ^ (n - k + 1))

rule.latex_str: rewriting \(y (x ^ {k} y ^ {-k + n} C(n,k))\) to \(C(n,k) x ^ {k} y ^ {n - k + 1}\)
rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting y * (x ^ k * y ^ (-k + n) * C(n,k)) to C(n,k) * x ^ k * y ^ (n - k + 1)

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting SUM(i, 1, n, x ^ i * y ^ (-i + n + 1) * C(n,i - 1)) + SUM(i, 1, n, x ^ i * y ^ (-i + n + 1) * C(n,i)) to SUM(i, 1, n, x ^ i * y ^ (-i + n + 1) * C(n,i - 1) + x ^ i * y ^ (-i + n + 1) * C(n,i))

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting x ^ i * y ^ (-i + n + 1) * C(n,i - 1) + x ^ i * y ^ (-i + n + 1) * C(n,i) to x ^ i * y ^ (-i + n + 1) * (C(n,i - 1) + C(n,i))

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: C(n,m - 1) + C(n,m) = C(n + 1,m) at 0.0.0.1

steps.res: SUM(i, 0, 0, x ^ i * y ^ (-i + n + 1) * (factorial(n + 1) / (factorial(i) * factorial(-i + n + 1)))) + (SUM(j, 0 + 1, n + 1 - 1, x ^ j * y ^ (-j + n + 1) * C(n + 1,j)) + SUM(j, n + 1, n + 1, x ^ j * y ^ (-j + n + 1) * C(n + 1,j)))

SUM(i, 0, 0, x ^ i * y ^ (-i + n + 1) * (factorial(n + 1) / (factorial(i) * factorial(-i + n + 1)))) + (SUM(j, 0 + 1, n + 1 - 1, x ^ j * y ^ (-j + n + 1) * C(n + 1,j)) + SUM(j, n + 1, n + 1, x ^ j * y ^ (-j + n + 1) * (factorial(n + 1) / (factorial(j) * factorial(-j + n + 1)))))
